name: Bonifacio VS The Piracy
description:
Meet Bonifacio! He's a british cop that was sent to Russia to stop the piracy..with his bullets..at least, that what we all thought.

Controls -

Arrow Keys to move

Z - Jump

X - Shoot

the game only has 1 short stage, because its a prototype made in a week for a game jam. Also, the only song used is Hourglass Meadow by Oliver Buckland. This song will not be used in the final game and i am not getting any money by using this song. I just used it because i thought it sounded nice for the game.
